properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 3 at 3:00PM CST until February 5 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Dodge City KS
properties.description:
...Light Snow and Strong North Winds Tuesday...

* WHAT...Light snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to
two inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Ellis and Rush Counties.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to midnight CST Tuesday night.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing
snow will reduce visibility, especially in open areas.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Degraded travel conditions are expected
during the Tuesday morning commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT CST TUESDAY NIGHT
